TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemanticResultValue extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a semantic value and optionally associates the value with a component of a speech recognition grammar.
Docs.related: Using a SemanticResultKey to Extract a SemanticResultValue

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `SemanticResultValue` constructors support specifying an <xref:System.Object> instance with an underlying data type of `bool`, `int`, `float`, or `string`.
A constructor can create a `SemanticResultValue` instance in either of two circumstances:
- The `SemanticResultValue` instance must be explicitly associated with a grammar element when using a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>.
- The `SemanticResultValue` is already associated with a string value phrase or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> object.
